text.0: by faith is agni kindled through faith is oblation offered up.
text.1: we celebrate with praises faith upon the height of happiness.
text.2: bless thou the man who gives o faith faith bless the man who fain would give.
text.3: bless thou the liberal worshippers bless thou the word that i have said.
text.4: even as the deities maintained faith in the mighty asuras.
text.5: so make this uttered wish of mine true for the liberal worshippers.
text.6: guarded by vāyu gods and men who sacrifice draw near to faith.
text.7: man winneth faith by yearnings of the heart and opulence by faith.
text.8: faith in the early morning faith at noonday will we invocate.
text.9: faith at the setting of the sun o faith endow us with belief.
